name: Russell Reynolds
description: Russell Reynolds Associates is a global leadership advisory firm. Our 520+ consultants in 47 offices work with public, private and nonprofit organizations across all industries and regions. We help our clients build teams of transformational leaders who can meet today’s challenges and anticipate the digital, economic and political trends that are reshaping the global business environment. From helping boards with their structure, culture and effectiveness to identifying, assessing and defining the best leadership for organizations, our teams bring their decades of expertise to help clients address their most complex leadership issues. We exist to improve the way the world is led.

enhanced_description: Russell Reynolds Associates is a global leadership advisory and search firm with over 520 consultants operating from 47 offices across 25 countries. They partner with public, private, and nonprofit organizations across all industries and regions. Their core mission is to help clients build teams of transformational leaders capable of addressing current challenges and anticipating future digital, economic, and political trends. Services include advising boards on structure, culture, and effectiveness, as well as identifying, assessing, and defining optimal leadership for organizations. The firm emphasizes living by its values, leading with sustainability, and celebrating Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DE&I) in its approach to improving global leadership.
